title.rendered: Airlines operating from Jay Prakash Narayan Airport Main Terminal, Patna, India

content.rendered:
View the list of airlines operating from Jay Prakash Narayan Airport Main Terminal in Patna, India and the contact details of each airlines.

Air India

Air India operates from Main Terminal of Jay Prakash Narayan in Patna, India

Alliance Air operates from Main Terminal of Jay Prakash Narayan in Patna, India

Spicejet
